promotion.title: Be
promotion.subtitle: ...with Mue, a fast, open, and free-to-use new tab page for modern browsers.

widgets.title: Widgets
widgets.description: Mue comes with many widgets for easy access to information on your new tab page to improve productivity and motivation.

opensource.title: Open-source
opensource.description: Mue is open source and available on GitHub. Feel free to contribute!

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Mue is built with privacy in mind. No data is tracked or stored, and the API code is open source.

extensible.title: Extensible
extensible.description: More content like photo packs and preset settings can be downloaded from the Mue marketplace.

shareyourmue.title: Mue is for
shareyourmue.description_end: on social media to share your Mue with the world and have the chance of appearing below.
